title: Python Interview Prep
description: Common Python interview questions with examples.

content.heading: List vs Tuple
content.code:
# List is mutable, Tuple is immutable
my_list = [1, 2, 3]
my_tuple = (1, 2, 3)
my_list[0] = 10
# my_tuple[0] = 10  # This will give an error

content.heading: Decorators
PEP8
content.code:
# PEP8 is Python style guide
# Example: use 4 spaces for indentation
for i in range(5):
    print(i)

examples.code:
# Example of using list and tuple
print(len([1,2,3]))  # list
print(len((1,2,3)))  # tuple

quiz.question: What is the purpose of decorators?

summary: You learned about lists vs tuples, decorators, and Python coding standards (PEP8).
